title: Plz do help
body: After updating i am not able to  play league login page dosent load plz reply

replies.body: If that login screen isn't loading at all, there's a good chance that something is blocking your network from grabbing the data it needs to display. It could be caused by some kind of firewall setting that isn't interacting quite right with League. Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get that straightened out and get you back on the Rift!
